thing-type.label: Midea Air Conditioner
thing-type.description: Midea Air Conditioner with USB WIFI stick. There are 2 versions: v2 - without encryption, v3 - with encryption - Token and Key must be provided, it can be automatically obtained from Cloud.

parameter.name: ipPort
parameter.label: IP Port
parameter.description: IP port of the device (for V2: 6444).

parameter.name: deviceId
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: ID of the device. Leave 0 to do ID discovery.

parameter.name: cloud
parameter.label: Cloud Provider
parameter.description: Cloud Provider name for email and password.

parameter.name: email
parameter.label: Email
parameter.description: Email for cloud account chosen in Cloud Provider.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password for cloud account chosen in Cloud Provider.

parameter.name: token
parameter.label: Token
parameter.description: Secret Token (length 128 HEX) used for secure connection authentication used with devices v3 (if not known, enter email and password for Cloud to retrieve it).

parameter.name: key
parameter.label: Key
parameter.description: Secret Key (length 64 HEX) used for secure connection authentication used with devices v3 (if not known, enter email and password for Cloud to retrieve it).

parameter.name: pollingTime
parameter.label: Polling time
parameter.description: Polling time in seconds. Minimum time is 30 seconds, default 60 seconds.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: Connecting timeout. Minimum time is 2 second, maximum 10 seconds (4 seconds default).

parameter.name: promptTone
parameter.label: Prompt tone
parameter.description: After sending a command device will play "ding" tone when command is received and executed.

parameter.name: version
parameter.label: AC Version
parameter.description: Version 3 requires Token, Key and Cloud provider. Version 2 doesn't. Leave blank to discover

channel-type.label: Power
channel-type.description: Turn the AC on and off.

channel-type.label: Operational mode
channel-type.description: Operational mode: AUTO, COOL, DRY, HEAT.

channel-type.label: Fan speed
channel-type.description: Fan speed: SILENT, LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, FULL, AUTO.

channel-type.label: Swing mode
channel-type.description: Swing mode: OFF, VERTICAL, HORIZONTAL, BOTH. Some V3 versions do not support

channel-type.label: Eco mode
channel-type.description: Eco mode, Cool only, Temp: min. 24C, Fan: AUTO.

channel-type.label: Turbo mode
channel-type.description: Turbo mode, "Boost" in Midea Air app, long press "+" on IR Remote Controller. Only works in COOL and HEAT mode.

channel-type.label: Indoor temperature
channel-type.description: Indoor temperature measured by the internal unit. Not frequent when unit is off

channel-type.label: Outdoor temperature
channel-type.description: Outdoor temperature from the external unit. Not frequent when unit is off

channel-type.label: Sleep function
channel-type.description: Sleep function ("Moon with a star" icon on IR Remote Controller).

channel-type.label: Temperature unit on LED Display
channel-type.description: On = Farenheit on Indoor AC unit LED display, Off = Celsius.

channel-type.label: Screen display
channel-type.description: Status of LEDs on the device. Not all models work on LAN (only IR). No confirmation possible either.

channel-type.label: Humidity
channel-type.description: Humidity measured in the room by the indoor unit.
